Starting with **Tower v3.2.0**, you can customize the `widgets` in the `drawer` on the right side of the `Flight Data` screen. 

##### Guide
- Navigate to `Settings` -> `User Interface`
![tower_settings_user_interface](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/914968/10264834/13bed8b4-69cd-11e5-8348-8acea624dfb9.png)

- Click on `Widgets Preferences`
![tower_settings_widget_pref](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/914968/10264838/2034be4c-69cd-11e5-8fcf-c252495a74e0.png)

- Enable / Disable desired widgets.
![tower_widget_list](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/914968/10264842/2f68dce0-69cd-11e5-8ce4-021610a047ce.png)  
![tower_flight_data_screen](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/914968/10264864/5f3326d2-69ce-11e5-8d07-5e422e80f025.png)


**Note**: Widgets with the ![ic_more_vert_black_18dp](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/914968/10264876/c3402e36-69ce-11e5-9368-5920df0110a8.png) icon can be clicked on for a more detailed view.
